original_text: In the same way, deacons must live good lives, so that people respect them. They must not be hypocrites. They must not drink too much wine. They must not want to get a lot of money for themselves.
korean_text: 이와 같이 집사들도 정중하고 일구이언을 하지 아니하고 술에 인박히지 아니하고 더러운 이를 탐하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: In the same way, deacons must live good lives
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같은 방식으로, 집사들은 좋은 삶을 살아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They must not drink too much wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너무 많은 포도주를 마시면 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: They must not want to get a lot of money for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신을 위해 많은 돈을 얻으려고 해서는 안 됩니다
